name: Shoot The Boss Classic Arcade Games Fun Battle Free
name_original: Shoot The Boss Classic Arcade Games Fun Battle Free
description:
Time to pull out the BIG guns, and shoot that boss!

Love this stress relief game!. Download now to beat up your boss with this game! Tell your buddies to play too, just don't let your boss know.

We know how stupid and mean your boss can be. Stand up for yourself, give them what they deserve. Fire a CANON right in the boss' smug face! Don’t let their cute appearance fool you, just get rid of them any way you can. Your massive cannon and an accurate aim should be more than enough to do the trick.


KEY FEATURES:

*Many exclusive levels
*Simple "1-Touch" controls
